detail_desc: Short dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with an opening at the front with twisted ties at the top. Decorative jacquard-weave trim around the neckline and down the front opening, a gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with an opening at the front with twisted ties at the top. Decorative jacquard-weave trim around the neckline and down the front opening, a gathered seam at the waist and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tassel-trimmed hems.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with embroidery, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Short shorts in stripe-print poplin with embroidery. Concealed zip in one side.

Jacket in denim with imitation leather sleeves, a collar, buttons down the front and a zip at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Trousers in airy crinkled chiffon with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with slits at the front that go up to the waist. Lined with short jersey shorts.
Trousers in airy crinkled chiffon with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with slits at the front that go up to the waist. Lined with short jersey shorts.
Pile-lined, imitation suede jacket with a hood, diagonal zip down the front, zipped chest pocket and side pockets. Slightly longer at the back.
Short blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long, flared sleeves and a tassel-trimmed hem. Unlined.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets and back pockets.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets and back pockets.
V-neck top in woven fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an open back with ties at the top.
Shirt in checked cotton twill with a drawstring hood, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, frills at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and concealed elastication under the bust for extra support. Gathers at the sides for best fit.
Fully lined swimsuit with shaped, padded cups, a low-cut back and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Hat in braided paper straw with a decorative hole pattern. Width of brim 14 cm.

Sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, embroidered appliqués at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam and a wide lace trim at the waist and a flared skirt with a rounded hem and embroidered appliqués. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Crocheted lace panels at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and on the double-layered sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and on the double-layered sleeves.
Short dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves with ties, a concealed zip in one side and a gently bell-shaped shirt. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a hood with an appliqué on top, zip down the front, patch front pockets and an elasticated hem. Lined.

Rain coat in functional, waterproof fabric with sealed seams and a detachable hood. Fleece-lined stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap patch pockets with press-studs. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a herringbone weave made from a linen blend with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Imitation leather sandals with adjustable foot straps with metal buckles, an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Moulded rubber soles, fluted underneath.
Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Earrings with sparkly stones and beads. Length 5.5 cm.

Earrings with sparkly stones and beads. Length 5.5 cm.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, drawstring at the waist, single back vent, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, drawstring at the waist, single back vent, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, drawstring at the waist, single back vent, handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, wide neckline and 3/4-length raglan sleeves.

Calf-length, flared skirt in a lightweight weave with an elasticated waist and gathered tiers for added width. Unlined.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Gently flared dungaree dress in airy cotton twill with straps that cross at the back and fasten with press-studs.
V-neck satin blouse in a straight cut with press-studs down the front, short sleeves, print stripes and contrasting colour trims.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and quilted imitation leather sections on the shoulders. Kangaroo pocket, diagonal side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and quilted imitation leather sections on the shoulders. Kangaroo pocket, diagonal side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in a soft slub cotton jersey and viscose blend with a deep V-neck at the front and seam centre back.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit, knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with a print motif on the legs, adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

Blouse in airy chiffon with embroidery on the front, a small, frilled collar and V-neck with lacing. Long trumpet sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Wide, straight-cut dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and gathers at the shoulders. Long balloon sleeves with cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Straight-style, cold shoulder blouse in stripe-print poplin with embroidery, narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves that are elasticated at the top.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with press-studs, and press-studs at the sides. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in size 4-12M.

Shorter top in sturdy, textured jersey with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem with a wide panel.
